title: If keep losing during pre-season...
body:
Hi,

I got upto Platinum last night. (Plat 5 at 0 LP)

When I play after the season ends (11 November onwards that is during pre-season) and say I keep losing, do I still get demoted to gold?.

I know the decay will be disabled during pre-season but do we still get demoted to lower tier?.

If we do get demoted, do I still get reward as being Platinum or treated as gold tier member?.

Cheers
Fish and Chips

replies.body:
Hey, soo all games all the way up to 11:59 pm on the 11th count towards your season rewards. so if you start a ranked game at 11:59 it will still count. If you are plat on midnight (and not in a game about to be demoted) you will get plat rewards. If you are gold by then you only get gold. I suggest what I'm doing and wait to play ranked after, because end of season you get alot of trolls purposely feed to ruin others

*Edit. If you are demoted after the 11th you still get what rewards you get from the division you were on the 11th. Also remember your end of season rank means nothing to your rank next season.
Your reward is based on the rank you are when we reach November 11.
So after 11th November, if I lose 10 rounds I won't get demotted?. OR I do get demotted but the reward is still Plat?.
